basics.name: Doug Worsham
basics.label: Higher Education Leader, Learner, and Designer

work.name: UC San Diego Library
work.summary: Continually improve the holistic user experience across the Library's digital platforms.
highlights: Build organizational capacity and infrastructure for inclusive, accessible, and equitable design.
Center diverse voices at every stage of an engaged and evolving design process.
Direct and organize agile project teams to provide a bridge between user needs and highly technical groups, partners, and vendors.
Supervise and lead the Digital Experience Team, including 4 full-time staff and 7 student employee design assistants.

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
